title: Citizens和WorldGuard
author: ckg1302
txt_content: Citizens的NPC一在WorldGuard的保护区域里名字就在Tab列表里显示，但又不能不设保护，请问大佬们有没有解决的办法

replies.author: nihongchun
replies.txt_content: 更换一个正常的TAB 插件就行了http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... ;highlight=FancyTab

replies.author: ckg1302
replies.txt_content:
nihongchun 发表于 2018-8-19 21:42
更换一个正常的TAB 插件就行了http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=437393&highlight=Fancy ...
太谢谢了
